metadata.synopsis: Voicebark when entering the Chamber of Loss in the Shar Grotto

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I... I see them. I see my parents. Gods... what's been done to them?
0.context: NodeContext: Urgent, tinged with horror. Seeing her captive parents suspended (alive) in the centre of the room. Arc: SH has rejected Shar and is looking to save her parents.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Prisoners...? Is this my final task for Lady Shar?
1.context: NodeContext: A lttle confusion/disquiet. Seeing 'prisoners' (her parents) suspended (alive) in the centre of the room. Arc: loyal to shar,having just staged a coup to take over her church.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Are those prisoners? What's been done to them?
